Figure 7: Three screen-shots (A,B & C) from the revised version of the bus traffic visualization. A shows the “regular” mode, where both buses heading towards the city centre (the two squares on the right) have the same final destination. B & C shows the visualization when one of these two squares represent a shuttle bus, which runs between the university area and the central station (represented by the small white square in the upper right corner).
